targets.expr: sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_validations_content{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) / (sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_validations_content{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_inits_state{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_executions{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_validations_state{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_trie{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_writes{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_account_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_storage_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_snapshot_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_triedb_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_signature_recovery{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + 0.000001)

(sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_account_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_storage_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_snapshot_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_triedb_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]))) / (sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_validations_content{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_inits_state{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_executions{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_validations_state{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_trie{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_writes{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_account_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_storage_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_snapshot_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_triedb_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_block_signature_recovery{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + 0.000001)

sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_snapshot_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) / (sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_account_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_storage_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_snapshot_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_evm_eth_chain_triedb_commits{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) + 0.000001)

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and rejection by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Rejection Latency

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Acceptance Latency

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries

panels.description:
Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the C-Chain.
The value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description:
Measures how long each kind of request on the C-Chain takes to handle.
The value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)
Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the C-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched

panels.description: Hit rate for the decided block cache
panels.title: Decided Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Hit rate for the cache where the key is the byte representation of the block, and the value is the block's ID
panels.title: Block ID Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Hit rate for the unverified block cache
panels.title: Unverified Block Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Hit rate for the missing block cache
panels.title: Missing Block Cache Hit Rate

targets.expr: sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_parse_block_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) / sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_parse_block_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_verify_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_accept_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]))

sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_verify_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) / sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_parse_block_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_verify_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_accept_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]))

sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_accept_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m])) / sum by (node) (rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_parse_block_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_verify_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]) + rate(avalanche_meterchainvm_accept_sum{chain="C", node=~"$node"}[1m]))
